dcterms:creator: M.J. Wilber
I.S. Kwak
S.J. Belongie
dcterms:description: The Yummly-Food dataset consists of 72148 triplets defined over 73 food items based on taste similarity. Each food item is represented by a 6D feature vector indicating different taste properties.
dcterms:title: Yummly Food Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Strese
Y. Boeck
E. Steinbach
dcterms:description: The TUM Haptic Texture Dataset contains signals from 108 different types of surface materials, each represented by 32-D spectral feature vectors for 10 representative acceleration traces.
dcterms:title: TUM Haptic Texture Dataset

dcterms:creator: D.A. Robb
S. Padilla
B. Kalkreuter
M. Chantler
dcterms:description: The Abstract500 image dataset contains 500 images of 128 Ã— 128 pixels, with pairwise perceptual similarities between them. Each image is represented by a 512-D GIST feature extracted using Gabor filters.
dcterms:title: Abstract500 Image Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Wah
S. Maji
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: The CUB-200 bird dataset contains 200 bird species with roughly 30 images in each class. The dataset is used to generate triplets based on visual similarity.
dcterms:title: CUB-200 Image Dataset

dcterms:creator: D.P. Fan
S. Zhang
Y.H. Wu
Y. Liu
M.M. Cheng
B. Ren
P.L. Rosin
R. Ji
dcterms:description: The Scoot facial sketch dataset consists of 1282 triplets, where each triplet represents similarity ordering between three sketched faces of a person.
dcterms:title: Scoot Facial Sketch Dataset
